alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:39PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kewaunee and southern Door Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 739 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bay Shore Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Kewaunee and southern Door Counties, including the following locations... Brussels, Dyckesville, Rosiere, Lincoln, Shoemaker Point, Duvall, Kolberg and Namur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
